suspect.describe: If a player's career data is abnormal or the data of a single game is seriously inconsistent with his career, there is a suspicion of cheating. The members of the cheating detection team require the player to prove himself or give the player time to prove himself after submitting a self-proof application. If the player fails to prove himself within 7 days from the start date of the status, it will automatically be transferred to the confirmed hammer

innocent.describe: The suspicion of the reported information was cleared through video

discuss.describe: The above evidence still requires more administrators and players to participate in the discussion and decision.

guilt.text: Cast a vote for the hammer
guilt.describe: The administrator thinks it is cheating, cast a vote, and the system will confirm the player's status if the conditions are met

invalid.describe: Reporting incomplete materials or reporting an incorrect ID, etc.

error.title: mistake
error.description: Please send bugs to the developer to help resolve issues

name.title: There are multiple results
name.description: Please enter the corresponding player's index to query; some results are captured below
name.noContent: Sorry, no results found in BFBAN
name.typeError: Please enter a number that exists in the above numbers
name.timeoutPrompt: The operation time has exceeded and the event has been released.
name.underLengthError: The input length is insufficient, at least 3 characters

checkban.idTyperError: The id type must be a number
checkban.idLengthError: The ID length does not match. Please enter between 5 and 50 characters.
